name: Arla Foods amba
membership: Milchindustrieverband; Dairy UK; LandbrugFødevarer; DIFødevarer; NZO; Finnish Dairy Association; LRF Mjölk; BCZ-CBL
goal: Arla Foods is a cooperative owned by 11,200 farmers from seven EU member states (Germany, UK, Denmark, Sweden, Belgium, Luxembourg and The Netherlands). Arla produces dairy products and sells them globally in more than 100 countries under brands like LURPAK, CASTELLO, ARLA and PUCK.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Landbrugs- og fødevarepolitik og lovgivning
Miljø- og klimapolitik og lovgivning
Handelspolitik og Lovgivning
Brexit

IP
